@dev function to get a period start and end
 @param _periodId the id of the period to get data

devdoc.details: Minimal implementation os SLA contract for the Messenger contract, to test inter contract interaction without dealing with the SLA deployment overhead.

params._periodId: the id of the given period
params._timestamp: the time the SLI has been registered

constructor.details: constructor add a Period at deployment time start 1577836800000000000 end 1594026520000000000

getPeriodData(uint256).details: function to get a period start and end

params._periodId: the id of the period to get data

registerSLI(bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: external function to register SLI's and check them against the SLO's

params._SLOName: the name of the SLO in bytes32
params._period: the id of the given period
params._value: the value of the SLI to check
